str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) To call (name) by a supplementary (additional, alternative) name, (b) mid: To call upon, appeal to, address.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
(literary and Jewish), without any preference (undue favor, partiality) for a person.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From ana and strepho; to overturn; also to return; by implication, to busy oneself, i.e. Remain, live.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
